function.name: update_profile
function.description: Update the user's profile. Only the fields provided in the request will be modified; all other fields remain unchanged.

basic_info.description: Basic information; any field not provided will not be modified.

health_risks.description: Chronic disease or risk labels. If provided, this array fully replaces the existing health_risks.

dietary_restrictions.description: Dietary restrictions. If provided, this array fully replaces the existing dietary_restrictions.

preferences.description: User preferences; unspecified subfields remain unchanged.

sport.description: Sport preferences, replacing the existing list if provided.

food.description: Food preferences, replacing the existing list if provided.

daily_goal.description: Daily goals; unspecified fields remain unchanged.
